description: A Custom Quaderno Connect account is almost completely invisible to the account holder. You —the platform— are responsible for all interactions with your user and configure all the account's settings, including all the information needed for tax calculations, programmatically.

id.description: The unique identifier for the account.

business_name.description: The name of the business associated with the account.

country.description: The country where the business is located. 2-letter ISO 3166-1 code.

postal_code.description: The postal code where the business is located.

created_at.description: The date and time when the account was created.

currency.description: The currency used for the account. Defaults to the country's official currency.

default_product_type.description: The default product type for the account. To be used when no product type is specified on documents and tax calculations. Can be either good or service. Defaults to service.

default_tax_code.description: The default tax code for the account. To be used when no tax code is specified on items and tax calculations. Can be any tax_code. Defaults to eservice.

email.description: The email address associated with the account.

local_tax_id.description: The local tax identifier for the business. If set, the account will be registered for tax collection in the country's jurisdiction.

state.description: The current state of the account. Can be either active or inactive.

subdomain.description: The new ACCOUNT_NAME assigned for your merchant.

type.description: The type of the account. Can be either standard or custom.

authentication.description: Information to act on behalf of the new account. The access_token expires after 25 days, but the refresh_token does not expire on Custom accounts.

token_type.description: Type of token used for authentication.

access_token.description: Token used for authentication. Expires after 25 days.

refresh_token.description: Token used to refresh the access_token. Does not expire on Custom accounts.
